post_text: February 2, 2016 at 5:11â€¯PM#1Hi there!I am trying to change filters using a macro, but i can't find the right syntax for it.I tried working around, by making different basic filters (Color, Iris, Focus, etc) and copy and merging them into one filter, but merging doesn't seem to work, as only the last copied filter remains in the new place.Hope anybody can help me out here, Thanks!
title: Changing Filters with Macros
